channel.title: Comments on: Devise 1.1 is out and ready to rock with Rails 3
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: Omar Garciapalencia
item.dc:creator: Omar Garciapalencia
item.description:
I try to install devise on windows 7 and rails 3 running on ruby 1.9.2p0 and i get this: C:>gem install devise Building native extensions. This could take a while... ERROR: Error installing devise: ERROR: Failed to build gem native extension.
c:/Ruby/bin/ruby.exe extconf.rb creating Makefile extension make is not recognized as an internal/external command Please, help Cheers
item.content:encoded:
I try to install devise on windows 7 and rails 3 running on ruby 1.9.2p0 and i get this: C:>gem install devise
Building native extensions. This could take a while…
ERROR: Error installing devise:
ERROR: Failed to build gem native extension.

c:/Ruby/bin/ruby.exe extconf.rb
creating Makefile extension
make is not recognized as an internal/external command
Please, help
Cheers

item.title: By: Jamil Daglees
item.dc:creator: Jamil Daglees
item.description: Looking great! I'll be playing with this tonight.
item.content:encoded: Looking great! I'll be playing with this tonight.

item.title: By: Rodrigo Dellacqua
item.dc:creator: Rodrigo Dellacqua
item.description: Great job guys, being used this as my first stop for authentication. Kudos #plataforma
item.content:encoded: Great job guys, being used this as my first stop for authentication. Kudos #plataforma

item.title: By: iteamon
item.dc:creator: iteamon
item.description: And finally my favourite part of merb-auth 'merged' into devise.<br>+1,01 for authenticate :user do .. end in router! ;]
item.content:encoded:
And finally my favourite part of merb-auth 'merged' into devise.
+1,01 for authenticate :user do .. end in router! ;]
